title: Amnesty LGBTI Meetup
description:
Please join us on Monday 5 Nov in CB2 café (Norfolk Street) at 7.30 pm to have coffee and take part in Amnesty’s Write For Rights, a campaign to write messages of support to people around the world who have suffered injustice.

This year, we will be taking action for Vitalina Koval, a high-profile member of Ukraine’s LGBTI community. She co-founded a community centre that provides a rare safe space for LGBTI people, and fearlessly speaks out against hate. But Ukraine has seen a surge of far-right violence, and Vitalina has been repeatedly threatened and attacked.

All welcome on 5 Nov ideas for campaigning. We normally meet upstairs in CB2, and will have an Amnesty sign to help you spot us. Best wishes, Richard
